entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
